hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Deku Shield# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Triple Giant Pot

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Side Room Near Dodongos

GC (Medigoron).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found in #Goron City#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Spirit Temple#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LW (Bridge).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ZD (Mweep).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.
